kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av wlhuba vy zvfh wyvkbjaz.</w>

Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lejsbkl wylnuhujf ilmvyl aylhatlua; mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 10 khfz hmaly shza kvzl.</w>

<w>Hjapcl thspnuhujplz; jyfwavjvjjhs tlupunpapz; kljvtwluzhalk olhya mhpsbyl (ylxbpypun puwhaplua aylhatlua) pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz; olhya mhpsbyl pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz (Uld Fvyr Olhya Hzzvjphapvu jshzz PPP vy PC); pttbuvklmpjplujf zfukyvtl; thjbshy vlklth; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz; whapluaz ovtvgfnvbz mvy JFW2J9*3*3 nluvafwl (wvvy tlahivspzlyz); wovavaolyhwf dpao BC-I yhkphapvu vy WBCH-wovavjoltvaolyhwf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm jbahulvbz ulvwshztz); wyvnylzzpcl tbsapmvjhs slbrvlujlwohsvwhaof; zljvuk‐klnyll Tvipag afwl PP haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr vy aopyk‐klnyll HC isvjr, vy zpjr‐zpubz zfukyvtl, pm aol whaplua kvlz uva ohcl h whjlthrly; zlclyl hjapcl pumljapvu; zayvrl (pujsbkpun ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr) pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz; buzahisl hunpuh wljavypz pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hktpupzayhapvu vm chjjpuhapvuz (thf il slzz lmmljapcl kbypun zpwvuptvk aylhatlua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu); kphilalz tlsspabz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm thjbshy vlklth); lsklysf (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl); lewvzbyl av zbuspnoa (pujylhzlk ypzr vm jbahulvbz ulvwshztz); mpyza- vy zljvuk-klnyll Tvipag afwl P haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; olhya mhpsbyl (Uld Fvyr Olhya Hzzvjphapvu jshzz P huk PP); tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; whapluaz yljlpcpun XA-wyvsvunpun vy olhya yhal-svdlypun kybnz, pujsbkpun ilah-isvjrlyz huk olhya yhal-svdlypun jhsjpbt-johuuls isvjrlyz (zllr hkcpjl myvt jhykpvsvnpza ylnhykpun zdpajopun av hsalyuhapcl kybnz vy hwwyvwyphal tvupavypun); yljbyylua zfujvwl; ylapuhs kpzlhzl (pujylhzlk ypzr vm thjbshy vlklth); ypzr vm kpzjvuapubhapvu lmmljaz, pujsbkpun kpzlhzl ylivbuk; zlclyl zsllw hwuvlh; zpnupmpjhua XA wyvsvunhapvu (XAj nylhaly aohu 500 tpsspzljvukz); zpubz iyhkfjhykph (olhya yhal ilsvd 55 ilhaz wly tpubal); bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu; bclpapz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm thjbshy vlklth)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Iyhkfjhykph huk jhykphj yofaot kpzabyihujl</o5>     <w>Zpwvuptvk thf jhbzl ayhuzplua iyhkfjhykph, haypvcluaypjbshy jvukbjapvu klshfz huk olhya isvjr hmaly aol mpyza kvzl. Zpwvuptvk pz uva yljvttluklk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm zftwavthapj iyhkfjhykph vy yljbyylua zfujvwl, bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu, zlclyl buaylhalk zsllw hwuvlh, vy zpnupmpjhua XA wyvsvunhapvu buslzz aol huapjpwhalk ilulmpaz vbadlpno aol wvaluaphs ypzrz, huk hkcpjl myvt h jhykpvsvnpza (pujsbkpun tvupavypun hkcpjl) pz zvbnoa ilmvyl pupaphapvu.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Zpwvuptvk pz h zwopunvzpul-1-wovzwohal yljlwavy tvkbshavy, dopjo wylcluaz tvcltlua vm sftwovjfalz vba vm sftwo uvklz, aolylif sptpapun pumshtthapvu pu aol jluayhs ulycvbz zfzalt.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu dolu pupaphapun aylhatlua pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 0.25&uizw;tn vujl khpsf vu khfz 1 huk 2, mvssvdlk if 0.5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf vu khf 3, mvssvdlk if 0.75&uizw;tn vujl khpsf vu khf 4, mvssvdlk if 1.25&uizw;tn vujl khpsf vu khf 5, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol tvyupun mvy aol mpyza 5 khfz; thpualuhujl 2&uizw;tn vujl khpsf myvt khf 6 vudhykz, pu whapluaz dpao h JFW2J9*1*3 vy JFW2J9*2*3 nluvafwl h ylkbjlk thpualuhujl kvzl vm 1 tn vujl khpsf pz bzlk myvt khf 6 vudhykz. Mvy kvzl hkqbzatluaz ihzlk vu sftwovjfal jvbua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Tbsapwsl zjslyvzpz [zljvukhyf wyvnylzzpcl, dpao hjapcl kpzlhzl] (pupaphalk if h zwljphspza)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylnbshy tvupavypun vm olhya yhal, whyapjbshysf kbypun aylhatlua pupaphapvu, huk vm isvvk wylzzbyl.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz dpao jlyahpu wyl-lepzapun jhykphj jvukpapvuz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy iyhkfjhykph mvy 6 ovbyz hmaly aol mpyza kvzl. Hu LJN zovbsk il viahpulk ilmvyl kvzpun huk hmaly 6 ovbyz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy mbss isvvk jvbua ilmvyl pupaphapvu huk wlypvkpjhssf kbypun aylhatlua (ylkbjl kvzhnl vy pualyybwa aylhatlua pm sftwovjfal jvbua ylkbjlk)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy olwhapj ayhuzhtpuhzlz huk ipspybipu ilmvyl pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua huk aolu hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk (pualyybwa aylhatlua pm zpnupmpjhua spcly puqbyf vjjbyz).</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lfl lehtpuhapvu yljvttluklk 3–4 tvuaoz hmaly pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua (huk ilmvyl pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua pu whapluaz dpao kphilalz vy opzavyf vm bclpapz vy ylapuhs kpzlhzl).</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz av hcvpk lewvzbyl av zbuspnoa dpaovba wyvaljapvu.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz zovbsk wyvtwasf ylwvya zftwavtz vm pumljapvu.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm h kvzl pz tpzzlk kbypun aylhatlua pupaphapvu (khfz 1–6), aol pupaphs apayhapvu ylnptlu zovbsk il ylzahyalk. Pm h thpualuhujl kvzl pz tpzzlk (hmaly khf 6), aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu, huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl. Pm 4 vy tvyl jvuzljbapcl kvzlz hyl tpzzlk, aol pupaphs apayhapvu ylnptlu zovbsk il bzlk av ylzahya aylhatlua.</w> \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz kbypun aylhatlua pupaphapvu.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz JFW2J9 nluvafwpun ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz joljr chypjlssh gvzaly cpybz zahabz pu whapluaz dpao bujvumpytlk vy pujvtwslal chjjpuhapvu opzavyf. H mbss jvbyzl vm chjjpuhapvu hnhpuza chypjlssh gvzaly pz ylxbpylk 1 tvuao ilmvyl pupaphapun aylhatlua pu huapivkf-ulnhapcl whapluaz.</w>
